name: Vegard
description: Vegard er en rom-entusiast fra Bergen som jobber med frontend. Vegard har en bred kompetanse innen programmering som følge av å ha jobbet i ulike bransjer.  Hovedfokuset til Vegard er å videreutvikle seg innen frontend og levere løsninger som er intuitive for brukerne.  Webløsningene er skrevet i React eller Vue med fokus på funksjonelle komponenter.På fritiden driver Vegard med variert trening, friluftsliv og automatiserer prosesser i et lite bryggeri, som kan kontrolleres/overvåkes via en webløsning.
haiku:
Frontend coding dreams
React and Vue bring delight
Code by ocean waves
summary_en:
Here is a summary of the description of Vegard in English:

Vegard is a frontend developer from Bergen who has a broad range of programming skills due to his experience working in various industries. His main focus is on further developing his skills in frontend development and delivering solutions that are intuitive for users, often using React or Vue as the underlying technology. In his free time, Vegard enjoys varied training, outdoor activities, and automating processes in his homebrewery, which he can control remotely through a web application.
